manytestsr 0.0.3.0000
  • Reference

Make a node-level tree directly, using a temp leaf_id

make_results_tree_direct.Rd

Like make_results_tree(), but:

  • does NOT require any pre-existing leaf identifier,

  • injects a unique leaf_id per row,

  • appends it as the final depth so all rows survive,

  • auto-detects the final pfinal* column.

Usage

make_results_tree_direct(
  orig_res,
  block_id = NULL,
  node_label = NULL,
  return_what = "all"
)

Arguments

orig_res

data.table from find_blocks(); must include

  • biggrp (dot-sep lineage, may be truncated),

  • p1,p2,… and a pfinal*,

  • alpha1, alpha2, …

node_label

optional name of a descriptive label column

return_what

a character vector containing "all", "graph" (a tbl_graph object with nodes and edges), "nodes" (a data.table with node level information), "test_summary" (a data.table object with one row indicating false and true discoveries, etc.)

blockid

name of your block ID column (e.g. "bF"), or NULL

Value

list(nodes_dt = data.table of all nodes, graph = tbl_graph)
